name: Dark Screen
description:
You are selected to be part of the CyberSecurity team of a company.

You need try a new OS and find more informations about a new network called "Darknet".

The game has 2 endings which you can complete in under 5-10 minutes (probably).

Be careful who you trust!

Retro-TV effect for Godot: https://godotshaders.com/shader/crt-shader/
